title: Sword of Clutching Umbra
content:
Shadowsoaked Strike: Strike an enemy, adding your Proficiency Bonus to the damage. Moreover, if the attack hits, it blow deals an additional 1d6 Psychic Damage. This attack doesn't break concealment. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Sword of Clutching Umbra Location & Where to Find

Location: Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dammon in the Last Light Inn. Dropped by:
